Title: Relates to establishing the crimes of cruelty to animals to threaten, intimidate or harass in the second degree and first degree
Summary: Establishes the crimes of cruelty to animals to threaten, intimidate or harass in the second degree and cruelty to animals to threaten, intimidate or harass in the first degree when in the presence of a minor child.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crimes of cruelty to animals to threaten, intimidate or harass in the second degree and first degree
